input.sentences: [female] was excited to go to the fair today .
we had to figure out first what we should do | since there was so much to do .
here we are waiting to get into the fair .
this was the first ride we went on for the day .
[female] was the most excited to go on this ride | so i took a picture of her from the bottom .
output.sentences: She was very excited to be going to the fair.
There were so many fun things to do.
Sometimes they had to wait in line for a ride.
They had all day to spend there and go on as many rides as they could.
Her favorite ride was the super long slide.
